author: CBC News
title: What you need to know about COVID-19 in B.C. on April 21, 2020
description: The number of people hospitalized with COVID-19 in B.C. continues to fall, but health officials say any loosening of the restrictions on daily life is still a long way off.
content:
THE LATEST:
  • Provincial health officer Dr. Bonnie Henry will provide her daily update at 3 p.m. PT.
  • B.C. has confirmed a total of 1,699 cases of COVID-19.
  • 86 people have died of the disease.
  • 104 people are in hospital, includin… [+4394 chars]
